#summary M3 structs.

= Introduction =

These are the structures found so far in the .m3 files.


= Details =

{{{
struct Reference 
{
    /*0x00*/ uint32 nEntries;
    /*0x04*/ uint32 refId;
};

struct ReferenceEntry 
{ 
    /*0x00*/ char id[4]; 
    /*0x04*/ uint32 offset; 
    /*0x08*/ uint32 nEntries; 
    /*0x0C*/ uint32 nFields; 
}; 

struct ModelHeader 
{ 
    /*0x00*/ char id[4]; 
    /*0x04*/ uint32 ofsRefs; 
    /*0x08*/ uint32 nRefs; 
    /*0x0C*/ Reference MODL; 
};
}}}
